sourcesContent:
import React, { useContext, useState } from 'react' import Context from '../../components/Context' import './Weather.css' import icon_200_201_202_day_oll from '../../images/200-202d.png' import icon_200_201_202_night_oll from '../../images/200-202n.png' import icon_230_231_232_233_day_oll from '../../images/230-233d.png' import icon_230_231_232_233_night_oll from '../../images/230-233n.png' import icon_300_301_302_oll from '../../images/300-302.png' import icon_500_501_511_900_oll_520_522_day from '../../images/500,501,511,900,520d,522d.png' import icon_520_521_522_night_oll from '../../images/520-522n.png' import icon_521_day from '../../images/521d.png' import icon_502_oll from '../../images/502.png' import icon_600_610_621_day_oll from '../../images/600,610,621(d).png' import icon_600_610_621_night_oll from '../../images/600,610,621(n).png' import icon_601_602_622_oll from '../../images/601,602,622.png' import icon_611_612_oll from '../../images/611,612.png' import icon_623_oll from '../../images/623.png' import icon_700_711_721_731_741_751_day_oll from '../../images/700,711,721,731,741,751(d).png' import icon_700_711_721_731_741_751_night_oll from '../../images/700,711,721,731,741,751(n).png' import icon_800_day from '../../images/800d.png' import icon_800_night from '../../images/800n.png' import icon_801_802_day from '../../images/801,802(d).png' import icon_801_802_night from '../../images/801,802(n).png' import icon_803_day from '../../images/803d.png' import icon_803_night from '../../images/803n.png' import icon_804_oll from '../../images/804.png' export default function Weather() { const arrData = useContext(Context) const data = arrData.weatherData[0] let srcWeather if(data && data.weather.icon === 't01d' || data.weather.icon === 't02d' || data.weather.icon === 't02d'){ srcWeather = icon_200_201_202_day_oll } if(data && data.weather.icon === 't01n' || data.weather.icon === 't02n' || data.weather.icon === 't02n'){ srcWeather = icon_200_201_202_night_oll } if(data && data.weather.icon === 't04d' || data.weather.icon === 't05d'){ srcWeather = icon_230_231_232_233_day_oll } if(data && data.weather.icon === 't04n' || data.weather.icon === 't05n'){ srcWeather = icon_230_231_232_233_night_oll } if(data && data.weather.icon === 'd01d' || data.weather.icon === 'd02d' || data.weather.icon === 'd03d' || data.weather.icon === 'd01n' || data.weather.icon === 'd02n' || data.weather.icon === 'd03n'){ srcWeather = icon_300_301_302_oll } if(data && data.weather.icon === 'r01d' || data.weather.icon === 'r02d' || data.weather.icon === 'r01n' || data.weather.icon === 'r02n' || data.weather.icon === 'f01d' || data.weather.icon === 'f01n' || data.weather.icon === 'r01n' || data.weather.icon === 'r02n' || data.weather.icon === 'f01d' || data.weather.icon === 'f01n'){ srcWeather = icon_500_501_511_900_oll_520_522_day } if(data && data.weather.icon === "c04n"){ srcWeather = icon_803_day } return (
{data && (

{data.temp > 0 ? `+${Math.round(data.temp)}` : Math.round(data.temp)}°

{arrData.nameCity}: {data.weather.description}

{data.sunrise}

{data.sunset}

{arrData.timeCity}

)}
) }
